thread.title: Australian court convicts archbishop for concealing child sex abuse

title: Australian court convicts archbishop for concealing child sex abuse
text:
Australian court convicts archbishop for concealing child sex abuse 11:32am BST - 01:11
An Australian archbishop was found guilty on Tuesday of concealing child sex abuse by a priest, which Australian media said made him the most senior Catholic in the world to be convicted on such a charge. Sarah Charlton reports.
